name: Wicked Paradise
description:
Story
Take control of a young man who struggles to find a place in the world and doesn't know what lies before him. Even with easy life and a few downfalls, he feels like it's been only failures. Living in a city of Los Angelos he cannot afford to be down bad. Until he's approached with a life changing offer, that can potentially bring him closer to a life he thinks he deserves... Or ruin everything. Discover people stories around you and your inevitable consecration into a world of crime. Build relationships with them. Your choices may or may not get you what you desire.
Game Features
Free-roam, point and click navigation with interactable environment.
Uniquely created 3D instances.
High quality QHD renders and animations.
Event replay allowing you to relive every event, times and times again.
